divs: Sighting DetailsI was just taking pictures to record the local fireworks. I didn't see these objects until two days later. I thought one was a scratch on the lens. Can not say how the acted, I did not witness them. I got the chills.
trends: There have been 38 other sightings in Riverside
There were no other sightings in Riverside on or around July 4th 2008
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: I took pictures of the fireworks, I did not see them until two days later.
